interactivity.requirements: Tuesday You must be on at least Day  340  to unlock this Event. You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " Crash of Thunder " from Ayane Amamiya Seen " Blood Everywhere " from Uta Ushibori
interactivity.to_get_this_event: This event automatically occurs on Tuesday.

progression.synopsis: In their own distinctive way, Molly and Tsuneyo tell Sensei that they want to sleep over at his house on Saturday for a manga club event. He agrees. Yasu joins the conversation, guessing that Sensei has immoral plans and telling him that the act of " transference " should be saved only for those willing to follow the light. Her preaching is interrupted when Touka appears, apologizes for her, and leads her away again.

changelog: This Event was added in Update .18p2.
